amendment.description: Amendment limits the Department of Justice to one extension of 6 months in certain whistle blower cases against contractors suspected of defrauding the government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to file a motion under section 3730(b)(3) of title 31, United States Code, for an extension of time of more than 6 months, or to file more than one motion under such section in any case.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Baird amendment (A069) Agreed to by voice vote.
